Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Today, Nanami is freshly eighteen! Nanami's an adult now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Aha, right! When we\'re eighteen, we can match with others with the "Gestalt" system and find more friends.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's mommy and daddy matched through the system and got together as well! It's an amazing piece of technology!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If it's possible though, Nanami would kinda wish that the person she's matched with is... black-haired... Will they be a boy?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Black hair looks really nice... But, even if they don't have black hair... it's okay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Maybe the system will find Nanami\'s "perfect match," just like it did for Mommy and Daddy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami will be happily ever after. Just like Mommy and Daddy...', 4: '1'}
